channel.title: Username on client is set by default
channel.description: How would I go about changing it so when the client loads the user-name isn't set by default and people don't have to erase his name and it's clear when the client gets loaded?

item.title: Username on client is set by default
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

Gui.java, search for aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j);

At the part where it says "Username: " try that.

Read full topic
item.source: Username on client is set by default
